holidays.title: Argyle Day
holidays.description: Diamonds are forever — let’s take a look at the popular argyle pattern and its history.

holidays.title: Earth's Rotation Day
holidays.description: The Earth rotates on an almost-vertical axis every 24 hours, which gives us one Earth day.

holidays.title: National English Toffee Day
holidays.description: Enjoy the delicious richness of America’s favorite toffee variant this National English Toffee Day.

holidays.title: National JoyGerm Day
holidays.description: Spreading positive energy, ideas, and happiness is how you can celebrate National JoyGerm Day.

holidays.title: National Man Watcher's Day
holidays.description: Join us as we create balance in the world by putting men under the spotlight.

holidays.title: National Snuggle a Chicken Day
holidays.description: There’s more to this feathery domestic bird than just being an ingredient for a sumptuous meal.

holidays.title: National Take the Stairs Day
holidays.description: How are you getting around today? We hope you’re taking the stairs wherever you can.

holidays.title: National Winter Skin Relief Day
holidays.description: See how you can remedy the drastic effects winter can have on your skin!

holidays.title: Show And Tell At Work Day
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate Show and Tell At Work Day this January 8!

holidays.title: Typing Day
holidays.description: Rest those fingers as we celebrate typing and the revolution it was back in the day.

holidays.title: War on Poverty Day
holidays.description: Here’s how to celebrate War on Poverty Day and the poverty-reducing initiatives the Johnson administration proposed.

holidays.title: Elvis Presley’s Birthday
holidays.description: ‘The King of Rock and Roll’ is remembered annually on Elvis Presley’s Birthday.

holidays.title: Anna Marisax’s Birthday
holidays.description: Beautiful and intelligent, Anna Marisax took the world of social media by storm.

holidays.title: David Bowie’s Birthday
holidays.description: He had a reputation for being gifted, and single-minded. Teachers believed he was truly gifted.

holidays.title: Gia Giudice’s Birthday
holidays.description: At her sister's birthday, Giudice broke down in tears and sang a song about family fights.

holidays.title: Joshua Perez’s Birthday
holidays.description: Joshua Perez is a TikTok and YouTube star who’s won the hearts of millions worldwide.

holidays.title: Noah Cyrus’s Birthday
holidays.description: Philanthropy, music, film — there are no boundaries to what this young entertainer can do!

holidays.title: Ryan Destiny’s Birthday
holidays.description: Ryan Destiny is a talented actress and musician who started singing at 12 years old!

holidays.title: Stephen Hawking’s Birthday
holidays.description: Hawking lived with motor neuron disease for decades, but this didn’t stop his incredible accomplishments.

holidays.title: Valkyrae’s Birthday
holidays.description: We are excited to celebrate this amazing pro gamer and creative content creator.
